channel.title: Remote Work on Danielle Maxwell
channel.description: Recent content in Remote Work on Danielle Maxwell

item.title: Dealing With Remote Worker Isolation
item.description: I’ve been working from home for about six years. Before I became a software developer, I taught English as a second/foreign language online for a few years. It’s been so long since I last worked in a traditional office setting that working remotely has essentially become the norm for me. I love all the benefits that come with working from home. I don’t have to sit in Atlanta traffic, I can wear shorts all day, and no one will look at me strangely when I talk to myself out loud.
